dict.acceptation: 发出砰的一声，砰砰作响，砰地敲[推，扔]；男性和（女性）性交；

sent.orig: The little one-two, bang, bang, bang and he lifts it over the goalkeeper.
sent.trans: 小一，二，砰，砰，砰，他升降机它的守门员。

sent.orig: "Bang!Bang!"the small boy brandished a phoney pistol and shouted.
sent.trans: “砰！砰！”那小男孩挥舞着一支假手枪，口中嚷嚷着。

sent.orig: Bang Bang specialty is chicken, beef jerky, dried, fermented bean curd are all better.
sent.trans: 特产是棒棒鸡、牛肉干、豆腐干、腐乳都较好。

sent.orig: Bang! Bang! Oh, man, thought Jack, this is the end.
sent.trans: 驾！驾！噢！糟糕，杰克想，我完蛋了。

sent.orig: Bang! Bang! Boom! Let's play to the rhythm!
sent.trans: 砰！碰！轰！大家一起来玩节奏！
